front.title: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol for IPv6 (DHCPv6) Option for Dual-Stack Lite

abstract.t: This document specifies a DHCPv6 option that is meant to be used by a Dual-Stack Lite Basic Bridging BroadBand (B4) element to discover the IPv6 address of its corresponding Address Family Transition Router (AFTR). [STANDARDS-TRACK]
